title: Nijigaku’s Live Day 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Is everyone totally ready~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu is super hyped to be able to hold a live concert with everyone again! Lanzhu’s heart is bursting with excitement!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, me too~ I want to meet everyone at the venue.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yup, I want to see them Ai-to-eye already~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu can’t wait to see what Ayumu and Ai have prepared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai-san is excited to see everyone’s performances as well~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m looking forward to learning from everyone’s charm points.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>If everyone learns from each other’s charm points, then won’t Nijigaku’s appeal become even stronger? Kyah! This is gonna be awesome~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
